Text: The Maze Runner (series):  The series consists of "The Maze Runner" (2009), "The Scorch Trials" (2010) and "The Death Cure" (2011), as well as the two prequel novels, "The Kill Order" (2012) and "The Fever Code" (2016), and a companion book titled "The Maze Runner Files" (2013).
